column5: You really need to get a job son. Your posts are entertaining though...good on ya!
And you are fast approaching 10,000 Mr. Boudreau
Yeah, I guess I could just sit here like a bump on a log.  ... but how much fun would that be?
Just imagine the length of fence you could build with all those posts.
Hey it's not the numbers it's the quality!
I'll have to go back and see how many times you used "sticker pecking" or "possum" in your posts.  Could be fun, like a drinking game or something. lol.
Congrats Glen, I enjoy your comments, reports and jokes tremendously.  Keep em coming bud  Joey

Now that was funny Andrew only problem water just came flying through my nose.lol  Yes dog you have alot of time to entertain and torment us but I would not let you change a thing Continue to entertain us with your red neck charm
Congrats Dawg!! This became an even better place the day you joined. Thanks fer all yer contreebusions    :clapping:
You've always been an asset to this board Glen, good having you around.
Dang crazy     old Reb!!    Yer more fun than a pocketful o' Crickets!
Good to see you're out of the 6,000 club now...smooth sailing right????
And to think I was happy just to get up to "Guide" status with 500 posts  WAY TO GO GLEN
